short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 365 Opportunities providing the numerical representation of the current day in the a year, accompanied by an inspiring message.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension will update your search settings and will change your New Tab and default search provider to Microsoft Bing.

By clicking "Add to chrome",
